French: Vous croyez que je suis trop paresseux pour y aller moi-même ?

English: Welcome to the Garden of Rhisis. I have been expecting you. Do you understand the nature of my research?
French: Oh, vous êtes venu m'aider ? C'est très gentil ! *fait la bise*

English: Handel is in the Northern part of the Garden of Rhisis. Please go locate her!
French: Handel est au Nord du jardin de Rhisis près des Tombstone.

English: Go find Handel in the Garden of Rhisis.
French: Parlez à Handel est au Nord du jardin de Rhisis.

English: Slaves to Shade
French: Des esclaves au jardin ?

English: You know where these monsters come from right? According to the records, they were the creation of Shade. Angered by her inability to destroy all of Roika, she plagued the lands with these foul beasts.
French: Qu'est-ce que je cherche ? Les secrets d'Ivillis bien entendu. Les monstres qui vivent ici sont ses esclaves.

English: Shade and her monsters succeeded in taking over all of Madrigal. She was subsequently defeated by 8 brave heroes who all rose to the challenge, restoring peace to the land.
French: C'est assez simple, que cherchent les esclaves d'Ivillis au Jardin de Rhisis ?

English: Shade is now dead, but monsters that she created still exist. In fact, they seem to be growing stronger and greater in number. I'm here in the hopes of uncovering some sort of answer.
French: Je suis persuadée que je pourrais trouver la réponse...

English: Research is difficult with the constant threat of Tombstone Bearers around. Will you please help buy me some time by defeating them?
French: Mais ces Tombstone ma barrent la route. Pourriez-vous faire un peu de ménage pour moi ?

English: Thank you for your assistance. Killing 15 Tombstone Bearers should allow me ample time to complete my research.
French: Si vous en tuez quelques-uns et laissez les cadavres pourrir au soleil, les autres devraient comprendre le message.

English: For the sake of truth, please do not pass up my request!
French: Reonan n'est plus très regardant sur ses associés à ce que je vois…

English: I've done it!! Because of your bravery, I've found an important piece of information.
French: Bien joué ! Je vais pouvoir chercher, je suis certaine que cet endroit va me révéler ses secrets.

English: I'm still in the process of research. Please go and defeat 15 Small Tombstone Bearers & 7 Tombstone Bearers while I complete my work!
French: Je vous ai dit de tuer 15 Jeunes Tombstones et 7 Tombstones, c'est important.

English: Defeat 15 Small Tombstone Bearers & 7 Tombstone Bearers.
French: Tuez 15 Jeunes Tombstones et 7 Tombstones, et reparlez à Handel.

English: Endless Loop
French: Boucle infinie

English: While conducting my research, I found something of interest about the pillars carried by the Tombstone Bearers. It looks similar to those of Shade's temple.
French: Je viens de trouver quelque chose d'intéressant. La pierre que portait ce Tombstone porte le même type d'inscriptions que les piliers du temple d'Ivillis.

English: Upon looking further into the information, I found that Tombstone Bearers were actually slaves of Shade that built her temple. But why would they be here in the Garden of Rhisis?
French: Si on en croit ce texte, les Tombstone sont condamnés à l'esclavage…

English: I need to acquire more data! Would you help me further by acquiring an Ancient Inscription? This might provide the insight I'm looking for!
French: Je suppose qu'il faudrait plus de texte pour connaître la cause de cette sanction. Je parie que la plaque d'un Capitaine Tombstone contient cette information.

English: I knew you would have accepted. You too yearn to discover the truth! You can find a Ancient Inscription by defeating any of the Tombstone Bearers
French: Allez donc tuer un Capitaine Tombstone pour que nous puissions étudier sa plaque.

English: How could you decline? This could potentially reveal so much to us about Shade's masquerpets and their growing strength!
French: En fin de compte vous n'avez pas de cran !

English: You got it!! Please hand it over quickly for me to analyze!
French: Vous avez trouvé la condamnation à l'esclavage ! Je vais devoir la traduire.

English: Even if you don't initially receive an Ancient Inscription, keep defeating them! I'm sure one of these Tombstone Bearers is bound to have the Ancient Inscription!
French: Vous trouverez la condamnation à l'esclavage des Tombstone sur la plaque d'un Tombstone.

English: Acquire an Ancient Inscription from one of the Tombstone Bearers.
French: Tuez un Tombstone et obtenez la Condamnation à l'Esclavage.

English: Essence of the Gods
French: Sceau de Rhisis

English: It's of no use… The stamp is just too damaged to gather much significant information. It did allude to the War of the Gods though…
French: Raaah, j'y croyais pourtant. La raison est manquante. Par contre j'ai trouvé quelque chose d'étrange gribouillé en bas.

English: I know from lore that, during this time, Bubble decided to take action against Shade and her masquerpet army. A battle occurred between the gods at this very location.
French: Il semble qu'un grand malheur soit sur le point de s'abattre sur madrigal, les monstres préparent quelque chose.

English: It is rumored that the essence of both gods remains in this garden till this day. Could you please find the Bubble Trace for me?
French: Nous allons avoir besoin d'un puissant artefact. Je pense que les Bask ici même ont en leur possession le sceau de Rhisis.

English: Please defeat the Basques in the North and acquire the Bubble Trace. Once you have this, take it to Bowler. He knows much more ancient lore than myself.
French: Malgré la disparition de son propriétaire, le sceau contient assez de pouvoir au moins pour ralentir les monstres.

English: You don't want to help me? Oh well... Then I will go myself...
French: Oh, vous ne voulez pas vous mêler de cette affaire ? Mais il est trop tard pour ça !

English: Hmm? Yes I am Bowler, last keeper of the lore of this continent. WHAT!? You come bearing the Bubble Trace!?
French: Vous n'avez pas traîné, c'est bien.

English: Please kill 15 Basques, acquire the Bubble Trace and take it to Bowler.
French: Tuez des Bask et retrouvez le sceau de Rhisis.

English: Kill 15 Phantom Basques & 7 Basques and find the Bubble Trace and bring it to Bowler.
French: Tuez 15 Jeunes Bask et 7 Bask et retrouvez le sceau de Rhisis.

English: Essence of the Gods (2)
French: Sceau d'Ivillis

English: According to my ancestors, this region was once a primary location for a massive conflict between Bubble and Shade. Lets put it this way, Madrigal was once all one continent before this war…
French: Tant que nous en sommes à rassembler des artefacts, autant y aller franchement.

English: We must also acquire the Shade trace. It's rumored to be held by the Pranksters, the last remnants of the followers of Shade. As you can see, I'm a tad too short to confront them. Could you get it for me?
French: Les Prankster sont des anciens adeptes du culte d'Ivillis qui ont été transformés. Ils gardent le sceau d'Ivillis.

English: I appreciate the assistance. Please go Kill 15 Small Mage Pranksters & 7 Pranksters and acquire the Shade trace.
French: J'espère que vous ne vous ferez pas tuer avant de m'avoir apporté le sceau.

English: What? Expect a poor little Dwarpet such as myself to take on an army of Pranksters?
French: Vous ne penez pas que ça soit utile ? Mais c'est indispensable !!!

English: So according to Bowler, this was the site of the battle between Bubble and Shade? The essence of each that you contain is definitive proof of this.
French: Vous avez le sceau ? Magnifique !

English: Kill 15 Small Mage Pranksters & 7 Pranksters, find the Shade Trace and bring it to Handel.
French: Tuez 15 Jeunes Prankster et 7 Pranksters et trouvez le sceau d'Ivillis.

English: Kill 15 Small Mage Pranksters & 7 Pranksters, acquire the Shade Trace and bring it to Handel.
French: Tuez 15 Jeunes Prankster et 7 Pranksters et trouvez le sceau d'Ivillis.

English: Guardians of the Temple
French: Supplique d'Ivillis

English: This essence of Shade is concerning… After the 8 Heroes had defeated Shade, all remnants of her existence were to be purged to prevent her return.
French: Ce sceau est ancien et puissant. Mais il va falloir le recharger.

English: If her essence remains, this is very bad… Stored in the Temple of Iblis is the Parchment of War. Please head there and retrieve it for me.
French: C'est très simple, il suffit de pratiquer quelques sacrifices au nom d'Ivillis et de lire la supplique d'Ivillis.

English: The Temple of Iblis is in the Southern most region of Saint Morning. The records are guarded by both Iblis Crashers and an Iblis Guardian so please defeat them to obtain it!
French: Par chance il y a des Ivillis Crasher et des Ivillis Guarder pas loin.Tuez-en une dizaine et rapportez-moi une supplique d'Ivillis.

English: We've come too far to just quit now! Please reconsider!!
French: … parce que c'est comme ça ! Arrêtez de poser des questions !

English: You've made it back with the Parchment!
French: Vous êtes incroyable !

English: Please bring the Parchment of War after defeating 10 Iblis Crashers and an Iblis Guardian.
French: Tuez 10 Ivillis Crashter and un Ivillis Guarder et rapportez la supplique d'Ivillis.

English: Bring Handel the Parchment of War after defeating 10 Iblis Crashers and an Iblis Guardian.
French: Tuez 10 Ivillis Crashter and un Ivillis Guarder et rapportez la supplique d'Ivillis.

English: Before He's Road kill…
French: La mission de Bowler

English: Please you must quickly hurry to Bowler! It seems the Wheelems near him have grown increasingly aggressive and he has grown quite fearful!
French: Hum, la supplique est écrite dans un dialecte étrange, ça va me prendre un peu de temps à traduire.

English: Will you hurry to his aid? In the meanwhile, I will attempt to decrypt these records. I know they contain something worthwhile!!
French: Bowler aurait besoin de votre assistance. Il voudrait que vous tuiez 20 Jeunes Wheelem et 10 Wheelem.

English: Your assistance is truly appreciated! Hurry and defeat 20 Rough Wheelems & 10 Wheelems then report to Bowler!
French: Ça vous occupera pendant que je traduis. Allez le voir pour lui dire que vous acceptez sa mission.

English: Oh no!! You must help him! Bowler doesn't stand a chance against those vicious Wheelems!
French: Vous préférez buller ? Pas de souci pour moi.

English: That was too close of a call! The Wheelems generally left me alone. For whatever reason, they suddenly grew violent and attempted to attack me while I was out near their territory.
French: Je parie que vous leur avez mis la pâtée !

English: Hurry! Kill 20 Rough Wheelems & 10 Wheelems before they can reach Bowler!
French: Tuez 20 Jeunes Wheelem et 10 Wheelem et rencontrez Bowler.

English: Kill 20 Rough Wheelems & 10 Wheelems and report to Bowler.
French: Tuez 20 Jeunes Wheelem et 10 Wheelem et rencontrez Bowler.

English: The Moment of Truth
French: Les affaires des dieux

English: The number of Wheelems has increased so much since I last remember. If it weren't for you, I would have been Dwarpet road kill…
French: Je ne comprends pas pourquoi les monstres comme les Wheelem sont toujours plus nombreux.

English: Has Handel finished her research? Oh! She is currently decrypting the Parchment of War? Will you hurry back to her and find if she has finished?
French: Alors, comme ça vous travaillez avec Handel ? Elle fourre son nez dans les affaires des dieux, vous allez vous attirer des ennuis.

English: Tell Handel that I said thanks for her concern… If she need my help, feel free to find me at anytime!
French: Merci à vous et à Handel pour le coup de main en tout cas !

English: Look I know I'm great and you would love to spend time with me, but this is sort of important!
French: Vous faites bien de ne pas vous mouiller dans cette affaire.

English: I'm glad to see you… I have to finish decrypting the Parchment
French: Vous arrivez pile au bon moment. Je viens de finir.

English: Go see Handel. She should be done with decrypting the parchment.
French: Retournez parler à Handel si vous êtes déterminé à vous attirer des problèmes.

English: Return to Handel and see if she has decrypted the Parchment.
French: Retournez parler à Handel.

English: Revelation
French: Supplique décodée

English: Why am I looking so distraught after analyzing the text you ask? Well… I guess the results are not what I would have wanted…
French: Oui, j'ai l'air troublée… la supplique n'est qu'une prière ancienne pour demander la clémence divine.

English: The records indicate that despite the efforts made by the 8 heroes to expunge any trace of Shade's existence, her essence still persists throughout this world.
French: Elle fait référence à la malédiction qui touche les monstres et à la prophétie de la libération.

English: When the time is right, she will regain her physical form and return anew to command her masquerpet army. It is her intention to reclaim the known world as her own…
French: Selon le texte le jour de la libération se rapproche. Ça explique sans doute l'agitation des monstres.

English: You must go and talk to Reonan as soon as possible. We no longer have time to waste. Please find him!
French: Allez vite mettre Reonan au courant. Il va falloir rassembler des champions pour affronter le chaos qui nous menace.

English: Reonan still hasn't explained to you the exact nature of the 8 heroes has he? I feel you are ready to know the truth and the role you play in this all…
French: Reonan vous donnera les détails qu'il juge nécessaires. Nous n'avons plus le temps.

English: I'm sorry if you feel uncertain about this all. Take some time to think it over…
French: Il est trop tard pour hésiter à s'impliquer !!

English: Greetings again! Ohhh…so this is what Handel has brought to light.
French: Racontez-moi tout. Handel a trouvé quelque chose d'intéressant ?

English: Please hurry back to Reonan. I'm sure he will explain everything!
French: Allez vite raconter ça à Reonan.

English: Return to Reonan with the results of Handel's research.
French: Parlez à Reonan.

English: Darkon: The Mysterious Continent
French: Les Héros d'un autre âge

English: This is more urgent that I thought… I was aware of the impending return of Shade, but this soon? I'm sorry I had to hide so much from you. Here is the truth…
French: Je dois vous faire un aveu. Je vous ai caché beaucoup de choses… mais cette prophétie change la donne.

English: Handel, Hael and I share a common past. We are all reincarnations of the 8 original heroes to defeat Shade in the War of the Gods. I was the first Knight Hero...
French: Je suis la réincarnation d'un des héros qui a combattu les monstres au côté de Bubble et d'Ivillis pendant la guerre des Héros.

English: We were all appointed by Bubble as champions of our respective classes, and led the armies of mankind against Shade and her masquerpets.
French: Handel et Hael ne font qu'un. Elle est la réincarnation du Héros prêtre qui nous accompagnait. Il doit y avoir une raison pour laquelle nous sommes tous renés à cette époque.

English: I feel it is due time for a reunification of the original 8 heroes... I know the other reincarnations are out there. I just hope we will be able to convince the rest of them. We don't have much time…
French: On dirait qu'une fois encore, les Héros du passé vont devoir unir leurs forces.

English: It has come to my attention that several of the other heroes are currently residing in a large continent known as Darkon. For Madrigal's sake, would you be able to track them down?
French: Il va falloir aller les prévenir les uns après les autres et nous assurer de leur coopération.

English: Make haste to meet the Mayor of Darkon. He sees over the main industrial town located in Darkon 2. Maybe he will have further information about the missing heroes.
French: Le maire de Darkon connaît bien ses citoyens. Il devrait pouvoir vous aider.

English: I know it is a lot to take in, but you are going to have to trust me on this one. We don't have any time to waste.
French: Vous trouvez cette histoire abracadabrantesque ? C'est pourtant la vérité, j'ai des témoins pour le prouver !

English: Oh! Hello young adventurer. You shouldn't sneak up on a man my age, nearly gave me a heart attack. Hahaha!!
French: Oh, mais j'ai entendu parler de vous. Comment puis-je vous aider ?

English: You must locate the heroes of the past, so that Madrigal might have a future. Please speak with the Mayor of Darkon. I guarantee he will know something…
French: Vous devez m'aider à recruter les Héros du passé pour sauver Madrigal. Allez vite chercher l'aide du maire de Darkon.

English: Go meet the Mayor of Darken located in Darkon 2. Maybe he will have more information on the missing heroes.
French: Allez vite chercher l'aide du maire de Darkon.

English: The Problem with Leyenas
French: Donnant, donnant

English: What's this you speak of? Heroes? Can't say I've heard anything about that… But, I believe I know a person who may have…
French: Des Héros réincarnés ? Première fois que j'entends parler de ça...

English: Oh you want to know? Of course I will tell you… But first perhaps you could do me a favor?
French: En revanche, je connais tous les porteurs de ragots de Darkon. Quelqu'un aura sans doute des informations pour vous.

English: I am frequently in touch with the mayors of both Saint City and Flarine. I have heard of your heroic actions and request your aid. There has been a dramatic increase in Leyena populations.
French: Mais avant que Darkon vous rendre service, vous allez rendre service à Darkon. Les Leyena sont très agités en ce moment. Cela perturbe les collecteurs de la ville.

English: They have made it awfully hard for our workers to collect a rare ore which is a staple export here in Darken. Please defeat the Leyena and I will give you the information.
French: Allez donc tuer une vingtaine de Leyena pour que les collecteurs travaillent en paix.

English: Thank you adventurer! The Leyena can be found in Eastern Darkon. Please decrease their population by killing 20 Small Leyenas and 10 Leyenas.
French: Vous trouverez des Leyena à l'Est de Darkon.

English: Hmm, what was it you needed again? My mind seems to be getting fuzzy... Since you are here, why not do some sightseeing?
French: Je ne vous aiderai pas si vous ne nous aidez pas.

English: Hah! It is just as I have heard. You are truly a problem saver! Now to uphold my end of the bargain!
French: La rumeur disait vrai, vous avez l'air gringalet comme ça mais vous vous défendez bien.

English: Well? I'm not getting any younger! The Leyena are found in Eastern Darkon. Please get rid of at least 20 Small Leyenas and 10 Leyenas!
French: Allez chasser 20 Jeunes Leyenas et 10 Leyenas à l'Est de Darkon.

English: Kill 20 Small Leyenas and 10 Leyenas.
French: Allez chasser 20 Jeunes Leyenas et 10 Leyenas à l'Est de Darkon.

English: The Great Teacher Inisis
French: Inisis la pipelette

English: Search out the Great Teacher Inisis. She has a wealth of knowledge on many subjects and has produced many outstanding students. If anyone knows it would be her.
French: Inisis est la pire commère de toute la ville. Aucune rumeur ne lui échappe.

English: Inisis can be found at the center of Darken. Please go see her! I'm sure she will be of assistance!
French: Vous la trouverez au centre de Darkon.

English: But be patient! Inisis will hardly give you the answers you seek so quickly!
French: Inisis aime beaucoup marchander. Elle ne vous donnera sans doute aucune information sans contrepartie.

English: Changed your mind already? Guess the task wasn't that important then.
French: Si vous avez plus important à faire, ne me laissez pas vous retenir.

English: Hmm... You are new here aren't you? Have you journeyed all this way to become one of my students?
French: Hum… que puis-je pour toi mon petit vagabond ?

English: Go see Inisis. She is at the center of Darken.
French: Parlez à Inisis à Darkon.

English: Go meet [Mentor] Inisis.
French: Parlez à Inisis à Darkon.

English: Corrupted Hunter
French: Géant mécanique

English: 8 legendary heroes? Hmm… Maybe… I have a person in my mind… but, I can't tell you so easily. First you must do something to show you are worthy of such information.
French: Des Héros réincarnés dites-vous ? Oui, ça me dit quelque chose… mais vous allez devoir stimuler ma mémoire ! *se frotte les mains*

English: Foul monsters known as Trangfoma have been reported kidnapping civilians outside of the city. They are lead by a powerful lord Trangfoma. It needs to be defeated.
French: Foul monsters known as Trangfoma have been reported kidnapping civilians outside of the city. They are lead by a powerful lord Trangfoma. It needs to be defeated.

English: Please kill the Lord Trangfoma located in Eastern Darkon. He won't go down so easily so I would recommend enlisting the help of fellow warriors such as yourself.
French: Please kill the Lord Trangfoma located in Eastern Darkon. He won't go down so easily so I would recommend enlisting the help of fellow warriors such as yourself.

English: If you don't have time for this, I don't have time to give you the information you seek…
French: ..hum ? Vous n'êtes pas un vagabond ? Vous avez pourtant l'air de quelqu'un qui dort sous les ponts.

English: hmm… Impressive. You are stronger than you look. I will give you everything you need to know now.
French: Vous n'êtes pas aussi faible que vous en avez l'air.

English: Please relieve us of this threat. The Lord Trangfoma should be in Eastern Darkon.
French: Please relieve us of this threat. The Lord Trangfoma should be in Eastern Darkon.

English: Kill the Lord Trangfoma.
French: Kill the Lord Trangfoma.

English: Peculiar Creature
French: Histoire de Karma

English: Normally I'd be skeptical of such a claim, but I do recall coming across quite a peculiar sight…
French: Si je crois à la réincarnation ? Bien entendu. Vous par exemple, vous avez dû mal vous comporter pour être réincarné en vagabond.

English: While out traveling, I came across a creature most bizarre not too far East of Darken City.
French: Je suis tombée sur une créature mystique alors que je collectais des spécimens pour mes élèves à l'Est de la ville.

English: It looked like an animal, yet it seemed to be talking. It seems quite peculiar and might warrant an investigation. I'm not sure if this will actually help you or not…
French: Il ressemble à une bête mais il peut parler. Il m'a dit être la réincarnation d'un Héros Elémentaliste. Je lui ai ris au nez et je suis partie…

English: Please go investigate the nature of this matter. Maybe this creature might know something as well?
French: Mais vu ce que vous me racontez, il ne mentait peut-être pas. Il se nomme Reodos.

English: I saw the creature near the Steel Knights, which reside in the Erons Factories. Go look for it there!
French: Il vit proche des Steelknights, dans l'usine des Erons. Va le trouver là-bas !

English: What? You don't believe me? Not like your story is any more believable!
French: J'ai dit que je croyais à la réincarnation, pas aux balivernes du premier monstre venu.

English: Hi! My name is Reodos...Oh come on! It's not like you are all that normal looking either!
French: Ne me regardez pas comme ça. Je suis la réincarnation d'un grand Héros.

English: A truly mysterious creature indeed… You can find it in the Erons Factories, near the Steel Knights.
French: Cette créature mystérieuse habite dans l'usine des Erons, proche des Steelknights.

English: Find the Mysterious Creature.
French: Trouver Reodos.

English: Steel Knight Night!
French: Feu d'artifice

English: What's that!? A reunification of the 8 heroes! You happen to be looking at one of them! I am Reodos, the mighty Ele…
French: C'est Reonan qui vous envoie… ahhh mes camarades ont aussi été réincarnés. Il était temps que les Héros se rassemblent. Je combattrai avec Reonan.

English: Well… was a mighty Elementor Hero… Shade cursed me. Trapping me in this cute furry little body was apparently the only way to contain all this power! Bwahaha!
French: J'ai été maudit pendant la guerre des Héros. C'est pour ça que je me suis réincarné en monstre.

English: I will have my vengeance upon Shade, she will scorn the day she ever messed with Reodos! Now I just need to figure a cure for this curse and…
French: Bien, je me vengerai un jour. Il suffit que je trouve une solution à ce maléfice...

English: Man! I can hardly hear my own thoughts with these stupid Steel Knights clanking around. Could you please get rid of some of them?
French: Ah, on s'entend à peine penser ici avec ces Steelknights ! Peux-tu en tuer quelques-uns, s'il te plaît ?

English: Awesome!! I'm trying to research into removing this curse but UGHHH those stupid Steel Knights! Kill like 20 Small Steel Knights & 10 Steel Knights. and I will be one happy unicorn, dog thing…
French: Merci ! Je ne peux pas me concentrer sur mes recherches à cause d'eux. Va en tuer, disons, 20 jeunes et 10 adultes ? Mes oreilles te remercient déjà...

English: You can't do that for me?
French: Tu ne peux pas me rendre ce service ?

English: Ah! Now I can collect my thoughts. What? You look at me like you've never met an Elementor before. Er… we are all a little eccentric I guess you could say.
French: Ah, désormais on s'entend parler ici !

English: Yes, yes the Steel Knights! Please eradicate 20 Small Steel Knights & 10 Steel Knights!
French: Oui, oui, les Steelknights ! Tue 20 jeunes et 10 adultes, s'il te plaît.

English: Kill 20 Small Steel Knights and 10 Steel Knights.
French: Tuez 20 Jeunes Steelknight et 10 Steelknight et parlez à Reodos.

English: Trials and Tribulations
French: Héros éparpillés

English: Oh! This pendant belonged to Reodos! So you found him after all? This is indeed great news!
French: Vous avez rencontré Reodos l'Elémentaliste ? Il était le plus actif de notre petite bande.

English: I'm sure we will be able to break his curse and shall all once again be reunited. It is time we began the search for the other 4 heroes.
French: Oh, il s'est réincarné sous forme d'un monstre... Bah, vous trouverez bien un moyen de l'aider.

English: Before this though, it is time you continued your own personal training. It seems you are ready to accept your second job class. This will mark an important step in your path so choose wisely!
French: Pour le moment vous avez fait tout ce que vous pouvez pour Madrigal.

English: Please complete your second job quest. Once you have done this, go and meet Reodos again. Hopefully he has broken out of his curse by now.
French: Vous pourrez nous rejoindre quand vous serez niveau 60 et que vous aurez effectué votre changement de classe.

English: Please go and meet Reodos as soon as you have finished with your quest!
French: Passez donc niveau 60, changez de classe et reparlez à Reodos.

English: It is imperative that you complete your second job quest. This will mark another step in your journey to becoming a true warrior!
French: Vous vous feriez massacrer si je vous laissais continuer maintenant.

English: Oh! I see you have completed your second job change quests!
French: Vous avez bien progressé. Faites voir vos biceps ? Ah non, toujours rien. Ça viendra peut-être...

English: Best of luck in the completion of the trials that lay before you!
French: J'espère que vous atteindrez le niveau 60 avant que Madrigal ne soit attaqué !

English: Complete the 2nd job transfer then meet with Reodos.
French: Retournez parler à Reodos après votre second changement de classe.

English: The Insightful Store Owner
French: Achaben le marchand

English: Oh yeah! Hah, about that… for some reason my concoction didn't seem to break the curse. Could just be a delayed effect! Heh, wishful thinking, right?
French: Il y a un moyen pour dissiper ma malédiction ! Mais nous verrons ça en temps voulu.

English: Anyway! You came at just the right time! I've heard that a man named Achaben has reported seeing who I believe to be one of the 8 missing heroes. Will you go talk with him?
French: Pendant que vous vous entrainiez, j'ai effectué des recherches. Vous devriez parler à un marchand nommé Achaben.

English: Achaben is the owner of the General Shop in Darken. Please go meet with him and see what he has to say!
French: Achaben m'a parlé d'une personne à Darkon qui se vante d'être un Héros. Vous devriez commencer par cette piste.

English: Still 4 more heroes to find! Lets not just call it quits now!
French: QUOI ? Vous avez abandonné la recherche des Héros réincarnés ?

English: Greetings there! What is it I can do for you?
French: Ahhh, je sens que vous avez de l'argent à dépenser.

English: Achaben is the owner of Common General Shop in Darken. Go see him. I will just lay low till then!
French: L'échoppe d'Achaben est à Darkon. Pendant ce temps je travaillerai sur la malédiction.

English: Meet Achaben.
French: Rencontrez Achaben.

English: Oh! Interested in the stories of this so called super hero I see? Can't say I know a whole lot about him.
French: Vous cherchez un Héros ? J'ai peut-être ce qui vous faut.

English: There was someone who had more insight into this mysterious man. Oh, what was his name now! Oh I've just got so much on my mind right now its hard to think about anything!
French: Rahhh je l'avais sur le bout de la langue… ma mémoire me fait défaut quand j'ai trop de choses en tête…

English: You want to know what the problem is? I had an important package to deliver but I can't for the life of me remember what I did with it…
French: Ce qui me préoccupe ? Vous êtes gentil de demander. J'ai une commande pour Remine à livrer de toute urgence.

English: The package contained special drills acquired from the Drillers in Darkon. Some of the sturdiest around!! If you could acquire some of these drills for me it would surely help a lot!
French: Mais voilà je n'ai pas les objets et mon livreur habituel est malade.

English: Oh! You will get the drills for me!! You are really great! Drillers can be found Southwest of the Gouthan Mountains. Acquire 10 drills and bring them to Remine the weapon smith.
French: Vous vous portez volontaire ?! Il faut donc apporter 10 perceuses de Driller à Remine.

English: Oh no... I'm in trouble now. Who will ever want the business of such a forgetful store owner!
French: Vous avez raison, mes problèmes ne vous concernent peut-être pas.

English: Achaben sent you here I see! Are these the Hard Drills I ordered?
French: Oh, vous avez les perceuses que j'ai commandées à Achaben ?

English: Thank you again! Please make haste and acquire the 10 Hard Drills and take them to Remine the Darken weapon smith.
French: Apportez vite 10 perceuses de Driller à Remine.

English: Acquire 10 Hard Drill from the Drillers in Darkon and bring them to Remine
French: Apportez 10 perceuses de Driller à Remine.

English: Customer Satisfaction
French: Livraison accomplie !

English: Just in time! Now I can finally finish my work. Will you tell Achaben thanks for me!
French: Vous êtes mon sauveur *bisou* ! Je vais pouvoir me remettre au travail.

English: Tell Achaben I will be doing all my ordering from him in the future!
French: Vous pourrez dire à Achaben que je ne commanderai plus que chez lui maintenant !

English: Oh? You think I should go tell him myself?
French: Mais je n'ai pas le temps d'aller lui dire moi-même !!!

English: Did you deliver the package to Remine? *phew* Oh, Thank you. You saved me.
French: Remine a pu se remettre au travail ?

English: Did you deliver my greetings to Achaben?
French: Achaben a eu mon message ?

English: Meet with Achaben.
French: Parlez à Achaben.

English: In the Shadow of the Mountains
French: Sur la piste des Héros

English: While you were delivering the package, I looked further into this hero that you were inquiring about. A friend of mine, Est, seems to have more information on him.
French: Voilà, j'ai plus de temps pour penser maintenant. Je me souviens que le Héros a dit se rendre dans les montagnes du Goutan pour aider Ist.

English: Est is conducting research in the Gouthan Mountains, but is currently besieged by monsters. If you were to help him, he will tell you what you need.
French: Il a aussi dit quelque chose à propos des Driller.

English: Please head to the Gouthan Mountains in Northern Darkon and defeat 10 Small Volt and 10 Captain Driller. Then meet with Est.
French: Tuez donc 10 Capitaines Driller et 10 jeunes Volt puis allez parler au Dr. Est.

English: Oh well, understandable. I'm not much of a fighter myself.
French: Vous ne voulez pas trouver les Héros ?

English: What!? The Volts and Drillers just suddenly disappeared! Oh, were you responsible for this?
French: C'est vous qui avez massacré les Driller et les Volt ?

English: Please hurry to the Gouthan Mountains! I'm worried that if we don't act soon, something bad might happen to Est!
French: Tuez 10 Capitaines Driller et 10 jeunes Volt, puis allez parler au Dr. Est.

English: Kill 10 Small Volt and 15 Captain Driller, then meet with Est
French: Tuez 10 jeunes Volt et 15 Capitaines Driller, puis parlez au Dr. Est.

English: The Jester Hero!
French: Un Héros nommé Zoro

English: I was trapped by the monsters while researching and hid behind these rocks here. Ahh, so you are searching for the super hero?
French: Ça me rappelle la dernière fois où j'étais encerclé par les Driller. Zoro était arrivé !

English: I briefly came across him earlier while high up in the Gouthan Mountains. He was in a hurry to save a young boy trapped in Eastern Darkon. Maybe you could head there?
French: Si j'ai bien compris il est parti aider un garçon emprisonné à l'Est de Darkon…

English: So you are going there? You are quite brave! This mysterious hero has to be somewhere near where the boy is in Eastern Darkon
French: Il doit encore y être, si vous partez maintenant vous le rattraperez peut-être.

English: Don't blame you. I prefer to stay out of trouble like that myself anyway!
French: Si vous ne faites pas vite, vous allez le rater.

English: Hush! Be very quiet! I, Zoro the Magnificent!.....am in the middle of a very important mission!
French: Chuuut ! Vous allez nous faire prendre !

English: Look around the prison in which the boy is locked in East Darkon. I'm sure the hero will be there.
French: Cherchez Zoro près d'une prison.

English: Find Zoro.
French: Trouvez Zoro.

English: Key to the Prison
French: Trouver la clé

English: I apologize but I have no time to talk. I have to figure a way to rescue that boy and I'm afraid the at time is limited.
French: Vous ne voyez pas que je suis occupé, là ? Je cherche à libérer le garçon de la prison.

English: At any moment the Steam Walker that put the boy there might return, so I must keep an ever vigilant watch! Maybe you COULD help me?
French: À tout moment, le marcheur à vapeur qui a mis le garçon là peut revenir, alors je dois rester vigilant ! Peut-être pourriez-vous m'aider ?

English: How about this? While I secure the perimeter, you acquire a key to open the prison door. Deal?
French: Je vais faire le guet ici et vous vous chargez des Steamwalker.

English: Great! While I secure the area, quickly retrieve a key from one of the Steam Walkers!
French: Génial ! Pendant que je sécurise la zone, récupérez rapidement une clé sur l'un des Steamwalkers !

English: If you won't help me then I have no time to deal with you!
French: Si vous ne voulez pas m'aider vous pouvez repartir d'où vous venez !

English: Huzzah! Mission accomplished. Good thing I was here. Who knows what might have happened. Anyway! Time for phase 2!
French: Vous l'avez ? Parfait, libérons ce gosse et partons d'ici !

English: Quickly! Quickly! Retrieve the prison key from one of the Steam Walkers! We may not have much time!
French: Vite ! Vite ! Récupérez la clé de la prison sur l'un des Steamwalkers ! Nous n'avons peut-être pas beaucoup de temps !

English: Find a Prison Key by killing Steam Walkers.
French: Tuez des Capitaines Steamwalker pour trouver la clé de la prison.

English: A Test of Trust
French: Pas si faible ?

English: Now we just need to wait for the right moment to open the door! What is your business with me anyway?
French: Donc, qu'est-ce que vous me vouliez ?

English: Gathering the 8 original heroes? Hmph. Been so long I can hardly recall. Only member I've kept in touch with is Elaine… err, forget I said anything. Hah.
French: Des Héros réincarnés ? Oui, je suis l'un de ceux que vous cherchez.

English: I can prove quickly if it was truly Reonan who sent you. Reonan is perceptive when it comes to people and he doesn't choose just any pushover! How about a test of your skill?
French: Vous dites que Reonan vous envoie… vous semblez pourtant si faible…

English: First, I need to test your skill. Go kill 15 Volts & 15 Captain Volts and come back, Then I will trust you and participate to Reonan's decision.
French: Il faut que j'en aie le cœur net. Allez tuer 15 Volts et 15 Capitaines Volt pour me prouver que Reonan a pris une bonne décision en vous envoyant ici.

English: How about you… mmm… Kill 15 Volts & 15 Captain Volts! BAM! There we go. A true test of skill. Then I will know for sure! You can find them East of this location.
French: Je dois m'assurer que vous ne vous ferez pas tuer avant la fin.

English: This is the only way to earn my trust.
French: Je m'en doutais…

English: Guess I will give credit where it's due. You aren't THAT much of a weakling! Alright, guess I will trust you!
French: Vous avez l'air d'une crevette mais vous avez réussi. Étonnant.

English: Zoning out the entire time I was giving instructions? Head east of this location and kill 15 Volts & 15 Captain Volts!
French: Déjà fatigué ? Vous n'en avez pas encore tué assez !

English: Kill 15 Volts & 15 Captain Volts.
French: Tuez 15 Volts et 15 Capitaines Volts.

English: The Retired Hero
French: Héros montagnard ?

English: Since you have my trust, I will give you another piece of information. There is another hero hiding out here in Darkon. His name is Elaine, Hero Ranger.
French: Comme vous m'avez convaincu, je vais vous guider vers un autre Héros réincarné à Darkon. Il se nomme Alain, Héros Ranger.

English: After the war, and our reincarnation, both Elaine and I fled up here to the mountains.
French: Alain et moi sommes amis depuis longtemps. Jusqu'à ce que vous me trouviez, je pensais que seuls Alain et moi avions été réincarnés.

English: If Reonan is trying so hard to reach out to us, then I guess it might be time again. You should go to find Elaine.
French: Puisque vous cherchez des Héros, allez le voir et dites-lui que je me battrai à vos côtés.

English: He lives west of this current location. Be warned. Since the war, he has retired his weapons and become a self proclaimed pacifist. I'm not sure how willing he will be to join with the rest…
French: Il habite au milieu des montagnes à Erunfax. Je vais vous donner une lettre d'introduction.

English: Well, you know where he is. Whenever you have the time, seek him out.
French: Ne perdez pas courage mon ami.

English: Greetings stranger! My name is Elaine. What brings you all the way up here?
French: Qu'est-ce qui vous amène dans mes montagnes ?

English: Elaine lives just West of this location. Please go and find him!
French: Alain vit au Sud d'Erunfax.

English: Find Elaine.
French: Trouvez Alain.

English: Forest Destroyers
French: Protéger la forêt

English: Ahh, Reonan is looking to reunite the original 8 heroes you say? He was a dear friend, but I don't think I will be able to fulfill his request. You see… things have changed since that time…
French: Reonan vous envoie ? Ce nom me semble venu d'un autre âge. Il apporte des souvenirs de guerre… mais je ne souhaite plus me battre.

English: I know it is for the sake of Madrigal! But, I've resigned from a life of heroics. All I desire now is to live in peace…
French: Je mène d'autres combats plus importants à mes yeux.

English: You sure are persistent eh? I'll hear you out if you do something for me. Recently, the ecosystem has been suffering due to deforestation caused by the Elderguards. Defeat them, and I will listen.
French: Regardez autour de vous. La forêt meurt à cause des Eldergard. Eliminez ces monstres et je me joindrai peut-être à vous.

English: Kill 20 Small Elderguards & 15 Elderguards, responsible for the devastation to this environment, and you have my undivided attention!
French: Tuez 20 Jeunes Eldergard et 15 Eldergard et revenez me voir.

English: The forest needs our aid!
French: Sauver la forêt est plus important que tout !

English: Wow, you really accomplished the task! Because of you, I no longer need to concern myself over further deforestation!
French: Bien, les Eldergard ont appris leur leçon.

English: Please go kill 20 Small Elderguards & 15 Elderguards before they destroy anymore of this environment!
French: Vous essayez de m'entourlouper. Je sais bien que vous n'en avez pas tué assez.

English: Kill 20 Small Elderguards & 15 Elderguards located in the Northwestern region of Darkon 1.
French: Tuer 20 Jeunes Eldergard et 15 Eldergard.

English: Construction Gone Awry
French: Des ptites roues, des ptits trous

English: Alright, I guess I should uphold my end of the promise!
French: Bien, vous dites que vous cherchez des Héros réincarnés mais pourquoi moi ?

English: You say Zoro is going to reunite with Reonan? Well... He did always like playing the Hero. What's this? A letter from Zoro?
French: Oh, Zoro vous a dit de me trouver ? Il va se joindre à Reonan ?

English: Alright. I will read his letter. While I do that, would it be possible for another favor? Monsters, known as Garbagespiders, have been ravaging the land. Could you please defeat them?
French: Pendant que je lis la lettre de Zoro, vous pourriez vous rendre utile et chasser des Garbagespider qui font des trous dans la montagne. C'est vraiment horrible.

English: Garbagespiders were once used to assist workers in construction. They have since become cursed and are soley bent on destruction. Please defeat 20 Small Garbagespiders & 15 Garbagespiders.
French: Le temps que tu tues 20 Jeunes Garbagespider et 15 Garbagespider, j'aurai fini la lettre.

English: Hmm… I would prefer to read the letter without anyone around…
French: Hum ? Non, je ne lis pas devant le premier venu !

English: Just in time! I have finished reading the letter.
French: Ton timing est parfait !

English: Please go defeat 20 Small Garbagespiders & 15 Garbagespiders in Darkon 1 while I finish reading this letter.
French: Non, désolé, je n'ai pas fini de lire la lettre. Tue 20 Jeunes Garbagespiders et 15 Garbagespiders en attendant.

English: Kill 20 Small Garbagespiders & 15 Garbagespiders located near the entrance to Dekane Dungeon.
French: Tuez 20 Jeunes Garbagespider et 15 Garbagespider, proche de l'entrée de la mine de Dekanes.

English: Elaine's Reply
French: La réponse d'Alain

English: Zoro wrote this letter to convince me… but no!! I thought about it and nothing can change my mind. After the war, I promised myself I would never kill again… I intend to uphold that vow…
French: Zoro a raison votre cause est juste mais je ne me joindrai pas à vous. Il y a vraiment trop à faire ici.

English: Can you bring this to Zoro? This letter is for him.
French: Pouvez-vous lui apporter ma réponse ?

English: Thank you. When Zoro reads this letter, he will fully understand my rationale…
French: Je suis désolé mais j'ai mes raisons, Zoro comprendra.

English: I hope you will reconsider. I want Zoro to understand my reasons for declining the offer.
French: Vous pouvez rester ici et m'aider si vous voulez.

English: Have you met with Elaine yet? Hmm? He sent a letter?
French: Vous avez rencontré Alain ? Vous l'avez convaincu ?

English: Did you give my letter to Zoro yet?
French: Apportez ma lettre à Zoro.

English: Meet Zoro and give him Elaine's letter.
French: Apportez la lettre d'Alain à Zoro.

English: Repressing the Past
French: Passé douloureux

English: *Reading letter* Hmm... I see. There is a reason he refuses to fight. Elaine had a sister, Hannah, for whom he cared very dearly…
French: *lit la lettre* Alain dans son incarnation précédente a perdu sa sœur Hindel.

English: She was killed during the war… Only, Elaine didn't learn of any of this until after everything was over. He blamed himself for it all…
French: Il a eu la nouvelle après une bataille monumentale et il s'en veut encore de ne pas avoir été là pour sa famille. De rage, il a jeté la bague de sa sœur.

English: In a fit of rage, he threw her ring, the last memento he had of her, into the air somewhere in Western Darkon 1. If you could retrieve it maybe he would reconsider?
French: Il a fait ça sous le coup de la colère mais je suis certain qu'il regrette. Il faut que vous l'aidiez à comprendre que ce qui se prépare fera du mal à de nombreuses familles.

English: I guarantee you a Garbagespider ate the ring. They eat anything and everything! Please head to Western Darkon and defeat Garbagespiders until you can recover the ring!
French: Un Garbagespider a aspiré la bague de Hindel. Chassez donc ces créatures jusqu'à retrouver la bague.

English: Oh… I figured you would do this for him…
French: Bonne chance !

English: Yes! Yes! This is it!
French: C'est celle-là !

English: I'm sure a Garbagespider has the ring! Please go and reclaim it for Elaine's sake!
French: Tuez des Garbagespider et trouvez la bague de Hindel.

English: Kill Garbagespiders and reclaim the Promise Ring
French: Tuez des Garbagespider et trouvez la bague de Hindel.

English: The Promise Ring
French: La bague de Hindel

English: Alright, bring that ring to Elaine. It will be painful for him, but… I feel it's important that it is returned to him. Maybe he will feel something that was lost a long time ago.
French: Apportez cette bague à Alain, ça va lui rappeler des souvenirs douloureux mais c'est un mal nécessaire.

English: I know he would rather repress all these painful memories, but the time has come to stop hiding and face our individual destinies. Please take this ring to him
French: Il doit se rendre compte que les forts ont un devoir de protection envers les faibles qu'ils nous soient proches ou non.

English: I'm sure the result will be good. Go! Give that ring to Elaine.
French: Il a plus de ressources qu'il ne le soupçonne lui-même.

English: If you don't want to do it, then I'll do it myself alright?
French: Comme vous voulez, je m'en chargerai personnellement alors.

English: Why are you here again? I hope I was clear before about…
French: Qu'est-ce que vous faites encore ici.

English: Did you return the Promise Ring to Elaine yet? What are you waiting for?
French: Vous avez déjà donné la bague à Alain ?

English: Meet Elaine and give him the Promise Ring
French: Donnez la bague de Hindel à Alain.

English: Time to Resign
French: Le devoir des puissants

English: This ring is... Where did you find this!? Yes... You are right. This ring belong to my sister. This is my only reminder of a past I've since tried to forget…
French: Cette bague… où avez-vous trouvé ça ? Oui c'était à ma sœur, la seule chose que j'ai trouvé d'elle en revenant de la guerre.

English: I gave this ring to her as promise to always be there for her, but I couldn't fulfill that promise… I will forever blame myself for the events that befell her…
French: *prend une air pensif* Pourquoi m'envoyer cette bague maintenant Zoro… que veux-tu me faire comprendre mon ami ?

English: You are right… I can't keep hiding forever. I need to take a stand. I need to prevent a situation like this from ever occurring again.
French: Je… je crois que je comprends le message. D'autres innocents mourront si je ne me joins pas à vous.

English: I will join alongside Zoro and Reonan. Before this, I need to wrap up some work. Could you please assist me this one last time?
French: Je combattrai donc aux côtés de Zoro et Reonan une fois de plus. Pouvez-vous m'aider une fois de plus ?

English: I oversaw the Darkon Environmental Association. Unfortunately, if I am to prepare for battle, I will no longer be able to fulfill my duties. Could you inform the Mayor of my departure?
French: Il faudrait faire savoir au maire de Darkon que je dois me préparer au combat. Il faudra donc lui dire de chercher un nouveau garde forestier.

English: I would do it myself, but it will take up even more of my time…
French: Je vous en prie, j'ai beaucoup de retard dans mon entrainement.

English: Oh, you are that adventurer. What are you doing back this way?
French: Oh, encore vous ? Qu'est-ce qui vous amène cette fois ?

English: It will be great if the Mayor of Darken understands my decision...
French: J'espère que le maire comprendra ma décision.

English: Go meet the Mayor of Darken and inform him of Elaine's departure.
French: Parlez au maire de Darkon.

English: Darkon's Environmental Management
French: Écologie à Darkon

English: Ahh! So you are here for Elaine? Of course I know who he is, Elaine is the president of our Environmental Group...
French: C'est Alain, le garde forestier qui vous envoie ?

English: What? He is resigning as president? Hmm… this is a bad news... He kept things stable around here. What will happen if he is not here!
French: Comment ??? Il démissionne ? Mais il faisait un travail excellent, il aime ce métier !

English: Hmm... You are right. The preservation of nature doesn't rest in the hands of one man, but with all of us… Could you please bring me some wastebaskets?
French: … hum, je comprends mieux. Je vais devoir lancer une nouvelle campagne pour l'environnement pour compenser son départ. Voulez-vous m'aider ?

English: Please go and collect 10 Wastebaskets from Garbagespiders. It is the time for a brighter, cleaner Darken City!
French: Je vais construire une usine de recyclage. Les Garbagespiders transportent des poubelles géantes. Allez donc en tuer assez pour m'apporter 10 poubelles géantes.

English: You don't even care about it do you?. If we keep this way, there won't be any hope left.
French: Vous vous moquez de l'environnement ? Mais si vous laissez Madrigal étouffer sous la pollution, vous ne valez pas mieu que les monstres que vous combattez.

English: Thank you! Now we will do our best to keep the environment clean!
French: Merci pour vos efforts.

English: Wastebaskets can be found from Garbagespiders, located in the Western regions of Darkon 1.
French: Vous trouverez des poubelles géantes en tuant des Garbagespider.

English: You can acquire Wastebaskets from Garbagespiders.
French: Tuez des Garbagespider et rapportez 10 poubelles géantes.

English: A Brighter, Cleaner Darkon!
French: Retourner voir Alain

English: We have went ahead and processed Elaine's resignation. Go and tell him about it.
French: Tout est en ordre, dites à Alain que nous pourrons nous débrouiller sans lui.

English: Let him know not to worry about us. We understand that whatever it is he is up to must be of the utmost importance.
French: Nous vous souhaitons que votre quête aboutisse. Il peut revenir travailler pour nous quand il veut.

English: Please let him know at some point at least!
French: Filez lui dire que nous sommes avec lui de tout cœur.

English: What happened?
French: Alors ?

English: We have processed Elaine's resignation. Please go see him now.
French: Ne trainez pas Alain vous attend.

English: Go meet Elaine and let him know of the result of his resignation.
French: Retournez parler à Alain

English: The Squirrels Took It!
French: Amulette perdue

English: Breaking the Curse (1)
French: Remède à la malédiction

English: As I was going to say! I would love to reunite with my fellow heroes, but I can't do much in my, uh… current form hehe. Never fear! I think I have a possible solution!
French: Dans mon état actuel, je ne peux pas aider Reonan, les gens fuient quand j'approche, les enfants pleurent, on me jette des pierres...

English: I have a list of items I need to create a powerful concoction that might possibly alleviate this curse… OR destroy us all. Want in on it? Don't worry, I'm sure everything will be fine! Bwahaha.
French: Je vais avoir besoin de votre aide pour dissiper ma malédiction. J'ai une recette prometteuse. Pourriez-vous me rapporter les ingrédients ?

English: Excellent! The first material I will need is a Forsaken Soul. You can collect one from the Zombiger directly West of Darken City.
French: En premier lieu, il me faut une âme torturée de Zombiger.

English: I would collect the items myself, but, I don't have opposable thumbs!! Hahaha! Jerk…
French: Non, je ne peux pas aller combattre comme ça !

English: Oh! Nice work! The first component has been acquired!!
French: Vous avez trouvé une âme torturée !!

English: Yes, yes Zombiger, Forsaken Soul, blah blah blah, you know what to do, now snap to it!
French: Les Zombiger vivent à l'Ouest de Darkon.

English: Kill the Zombiger West of Darken City and acquire the Forsaken Soul.
French: Tuez des Zombiger à l'Ouest de Darkon et rapportez une Âme torturée.

English: Breaking the Curse (2)
French: Dur labeur

English: Yes you heard me correctly, FIRST component. What!? Did you think breaking this curse would be THAT easy? Hah!
French: Merci beaucoup mais la liste est encore longue. L'ingrédient suivant est de la poudre d'acier trempé.

English: Next I will be needing Hard Steel Powder. Unfortunately, as with most things in life, this is easier said than done!
French: Commencez par tuer des Steelknight et récupérez des morceaux d'acier.

English: First you will need to get Steel pieces, then take them to Amadolka. He is knowledgeable in metallurgy and can convert the pieces to powder. Up to the challenge?
French: Quand vous aurez les morceaux, apportez-les à Amadolka et demandez-lui comment en faire de la poudre.

English: Good!! Kill Steel Knights near the Erons Factory to get the Steel Pieces, then bring them to Amadolka!
French: Bien ! Tuez les Steelknights près de l'Usine des Erons pour obtenir les Morceau d'acier, puis apportez-les à Amadolka !

English: What? Complicated? What's complicated is being a man, trapped in a fuzzy little body! Try that on for size!
French: Compliqué ? Imaginez-vous à ma place…

English: Woah! Don't get many visitors out this way. What are you looking for here anyway?
French: Vous avez l'air bien chargé pour un petit gringalet…

English: You heard me correctly! Kill Steel Knights to get Steel Pieces and go to Amadolka. You got this champ!
French: Vous avez bien entendu ! Tuez des Steelknights pour obtenir des Morceaux d'acier et apportez les à Amadolka. Vous pouvez le faire !

English: Kill Steel Knights to collect Steel Pieces and bring them to Amadolka.
French: Tuez des Steelknight et apportez les morceaux d'acier à Amadolca.

English: Breaking the Curse (3)
French: Les bons outils

English: Ahh~ turning Steel Pieces into Hard Steel Powder? Actually, I will unfortunately be unable to complete such a request, for my machinery currently is not operational.
French: Vous voulez de la poudre d'acier trempé, c'est ça ?

English: The only other person I can think of with machinery powerful enough to grind the Steel Pieces to Powder would be cell at the Erons Factory. Seek him out and ask for his help!
French: Cell à l'usine des Erons possède des outils nécessaires pour cette opération. Il se fera un plaisir de faire de la poudre avec vos morceaux.

English: I have little to no clue what you intend to do with the Hard Steel Powder, but I wish you luck!
French: J'espère que vous savez ce que vous faites…

English: Well! Back to work for me!
French: J'espère que vous savez ce que vous faites…

English: Har har har what do we have here? A new employee? You seem a little puny for a factory worker? Oh, nevermind!
French: Vous, je sais pourquoi vous êtes là !

English: Yes, Cell is his name. You should be able to find him North of this location. Ask him to grind the Steel Pieces for you.
French: Cell à l'usine des Erons transformera vos morceaux en poudre.

English: Seek out Cell and ask him to grind the Steel Pieces.
French: Apportez les morceaux d'acier à Cell.

English: Breaking the Curse (4)
French: Revenir avec les courses

English: Ahh so you need me to grind these Steel Pieces you say? Piece of cake, just give me a moment.
French: Attendez un moment, mes machines vont transformer vos morceaux d'acier en fine poudre.

English: All finished! Here you go. The machinery in Darkon is the best in all of Madrigal! Tell your friends about our services!
French: Et voilà, la supériorité technologique de Darkon fait ses preuves une fois de plus.

English: Well hurry on now! You obviously have something important that you require the Steel Powder for!
French: Non, non, pas de souci vraiment, je vous fais cadeau de la main d'œuvre.

English: Well, that is a little ungrateful! And to think I did this all free of charge!
French: Ce que vous faites de la poudre ne me regarde pas.

English: Aha! Now this is some finely ground Steel Powder!
French: Hum cette poudre est très fine, c'est impressionnant !

English: I must get back to work now! Hurry along!
French: Prenez votre poudre et laissez-moi travailler maintenant.

English: Bring the Steel Powder Cell has given you back to Reodos.
French: Rapportez la poudre d'acier à Reodos.

English: The Flower that Time Forgot
French: Voyage temporel

English: I almost have all the ingredients! The piece de resistance is a mysterious ingredient known as the Time Lapse Flower.
French: Parfait. Maintenant j'ai besoin d'un moyen de revenir dans le temps. J'ai été maudit dans une incarnation précédente, c'est à cette époque que je dois intervenir.

English: Time Lapse Flowers can be found only around Mars Mine dungeon entrance. The entrance is located at the most Northern part of the Flaris continent.
French: Près de l'entrée de Désiréa, au Nord de Darkon pousse une plante très spéciale. La fleur de voyage temporel…

English: Awesome! No worries! You don't have to enter the dungeon per se. The flower should simply be near it!
French: … vous comprenez vite. J'attendrai ici que vous me la rapportiez.

English: Haha, nice joke. You are quite the kidder you know that!
French: Vous avez bien travaillé jusque-là, ne me décevez pas.

English: Finally! Finally! Finally! Please hand it over quickly so I can make the potion!
French: Vous m'avez rendu un fier service. Je ne pourrai jamais assez vous remercier !

English: The Time Lapse Flower should be found near the entrance to Mars Mine. Please go collect it!
French: Les fleurs de voyage temporel ne poussent qu'à l'entrée de Désiréa au Nord de Darkon.

English: Collect a Time Lapse Flower which only blooms near the entrance to Mars Mine.
French: Rapportez une fleur de voyage temporel à Reodos.

English: The Pendant of Reodos
French: Bonne nouvelle

English: Ahh, so I guess I should express my gratitude to you! The potion will take a little time to mix so I guess I will hang out here a little longer.
French: Je vous dois vraiment beaucoup. Il est temps que je prenne ma place aux côtés de Reonan.

English: While the potion mixes, here, take this. This is a pendant to symbolize my unwavering participation in whatever is to come. Please take it to Reonan and let him know we will meet soon enough!
French: Je vais vous demander d'apporter ce pendentif à Reonan en signe de mon engagement.

English: Good! Then go to Reonan. I will soon recover my original body and meet up with the rest of the original crew!
French: Parfait. Allez trouver Reonan et sauvons Madrigal une fois de plus.

English: Err… well in that case you must have some more urgent matters to attend to? Please take the pendant to Reonan soon.
French: Hum ? Non je ne suis pas encore allé dissiper la malédiction, je vous parlais !

English: There you are! Unfortunately, I'm glad to see you but unable to talk at the moment. Take this time to reach level 60 then return to me.
French: À votre sourire, je dirais que vous avez une bonne nouvelle à m'annoncer.

English: Hurry quickly back to Reonan with the pendant!
French: Allez vite prévenir Reonan.

English: Deliver the pendant from Reodos to Reonan.
French: Parlez à Reonan.

English: Returning Home in Glory
French: Les Héros réincarnés

English: Oh, Reonan said to return to Flarine after you had completed your duties here. Do not fret about us any longer. Go see Reonan!
French: Reonan a dit que vous pouviez retourner à Flarine dès que vous auriez terminé ici. Allez donc le voir.

English: Thank you for your efforts in Saint City. Your name will be forever praised here. Now, hurry on your way!
French: Merci de vos efforts pour Saint City. Nous garderons votre nom en nos cœurs pour toujours.

English: Eh? You don't want to go back? Then, plese feel free to join the illustrious ranks of our tourist industry!
French: Vous ne voulez pas repartir à Flarine ? Je comprends que vous vous sentiez bien ici.

English: I heard of your remarkable activities at Saint City from the Mayor! I have another mission for you... but it's too early right now. Reach level 40, then I will give you the next mission.
French: Le maire de Saint City vous couvre d'éloges. Vous lui avez vraiment fait une bonne impression. Revenez me voir au niveau 40 pour votre prochaine mission.

English: Reonan is waiting for you in Flaris.
French: Reonan vous attend à Flarine.

English: Go to Reonan after reaching level 40.
French: Atteignez le niveau 40 et retourner voir Reonan.

English: Chapter 4 Turbulent World
French: Chapitre 4 - Un monde agité

English: In a way this is good for them. The citizens of Darken needed to become more self-efficient. I know they will be fine without me. There is another issue that has come up.
French: Le maire de Darkon a de la suite dans les idées. Hum, par où commencer… ?

English: When we finished the war, aside from my sister's ring, I also threw my pendant somewhere in Darkon 3. I was so convinced I would never need it again…
French: Avant de quitter ma précédente enveloppe charnelle, j'ai enfermé mes pouvoirs dans une amulette. Je l'ai jetée au fin fond de Darkon 3 quand j'ai renoncé à me battre.

English: Could you please find it for me? I know it is asking much of you. It is important that I regain possession of it though and present it to Reonan.
French: Je l'avais lancée à la tête d'un Nautrepy. Ces créatures l'ont peut-être encore.

English: Thank you. I feel that if anything, a Nautrepy has the pendant. They tend to seek out shiny objects. Please locate them in the Eastern forests of Darkon 3. Please retrieve it.
French: Les Nautrepy aiment les choses qui brillent. L'un d'eux aura certainement l'amulette.

English: It is imperative that you retrieve this pendant and get it to Reonan!
French: J'ai besoin de récupérer ces pouvoirs pour vous aider…

English: Oh you found it! Thank you so much!
French: Vous l'avez trouvée, félicitations !

English: A Nautrepy must have taken the pendant. Please go and check the Eastern forests of Darkon 3!
French: Vous avez trouvé mon amulette ?

English: Recover the Hero's Pendant from Nautrepy and return it to Elaine.
French: Reprendre l'amulette d'Alain aux Nautrepy.

English: Zoro's Pendant
French: Les amulettes des Héros

English: Please take this pendant to Reonan. This will serve as a symbol of my unyielding devotion to our cause…
French: Tous les Héros ont fait comme moi dans leur vie précédente. On est jamais trop prudent.

English: Oh! You have yet to collect Zoro's pendant! Go and retrieve it from him as well! Once you have done this, please take them both to Reonan.
French: Cette amulette, une fois utilisée, ne contient plus de pouvoir mais nous allons l'utiliser comme un symbole.

English: Zoro is waiting! Please go and gather his pendant as well. I'm sure once you show him mine, he will gladly hand it over.
French: Allez voir Zoro, il doit avoir le même genre de pendentif.

English: Please, we must get the pendants to Reonan to let him know we are ready to fight side by side!
French: Allez, vous n'allez pas me dire que vous abandonnez maintenant !

English: Oh Oh! That is Elaine's pendant! So I see you were able to get him to reconsider?
French: Oooh cette amulette ! Vous avez réussi à convaincre Alain !

English: Hurry! I'm sure Zoro is waiting!
French: Ne faites pas attendre Zoro.

English: Retrieve Zoro's Pendant.
French: Allez parler à Zoro.

English: United We Stand
French: La fine équipe

English: Hah! I never thought Elaine would change his mind so easily. This pendant here, well, it definitely shows that he means business!
French: Il vous a confié son amulette en symbole de confiance, vous avez dû l'impressionner.

English: I'm glad to see that the old Elaine has returned! Here, take my pendant as well! Now take them to Reonan and let him know we are ready to stand united!
French: Je vais faire comme lui. Apportez nos pendentifs à Reonan pour lui assurer notre coopération.

English: Head back to Reonan with the pendants!
French: Allez donc dire à Reonan que nous attendons son signal.

English: Well, whatever you wish, but I don't think we have much time to mess around!
French: Vous avez l'impression de ne pas être à la hauteur ? Ne dites pas de bêtises.

English: Oh! I see you have returned! You come bearing good news I hope?
French: Je me demandais si vous alliez revenir. Qu'ont donné vos recherches jusque-là ?

English: You have both of the pendants, now go see Reonan!
French: Apportez les pendentifs à Reonan.

English: Take Elaine and Zoro's Pendants to Reonan
French: Apportez les pendentifs à Reonan.

English: Gathering of Heroes
French: Reprendre l'entrainement

English: Two more pendants!? Ah Elaine and Zoro. It's been awhile… Thought I might never see them again… Knowing they stand by my side, I feel a renewed sense of determination!
French: Oh vous avez réussi à convaincre Alain et Zoro ! Je commence à croire que nous avons nos chances.

English: Now 6 heroes are gathered! I, Handel, Hael, Reodos, Zoro, Elaine are gathered. We just need to find the last 2! Before this, I feel it is time for you to hone in on your own skills!
French: Nous avons réuni 6 Héros grâce à vous. Avant de passer à la suite vous allez devoir continuer à vous entrainer.

English: We will need the assistance of warriors like yourself! But, you still have plenty of room to grow! Are you ready to further ascend your path to glory?
French: Si vous voulez vous battre à nos côtés, vous devrez être niveau 80 au minimum.

English: Please train to level 70, then talk with Reodos!
French: Atteignez donc le niveau 70 et allez parler à Reodos.

English: Real champions are born by pushing one's own skill to the limit. I know you have it in you to overcome the odds…
French: C'est la vie ! Parfois il faut attendre de grandir pour atteindre l'étagère des confitures...

English: Oh! Impressive! You have grown quite a bit stronger since we last met!
French: Je vois bien que vous vous êtes amélioré.

English: After reaching level 70, talk with Reodos
French: Atteignez le niveau 70 et parlez à Reodos.

English: Reach level 70, then meet with Reodos.
French: Atteignez le niveau 70 et parlez à Reodos.

English: Hungry Hungry Dwarpets
French: Rankashu l'expert

English: Oh! Haha, why I haven't changed yet you ask? I'm not entirely sure. I feel that the curse should have let up by now…
French: Malgré tous mes efforts je n'ai pas réussi à me débarrasser de cette malédiction !

English: I do know someone who may be of assistance. His name is Rankashu, a descendent of Shamanistic Dwarpets who have lived in Darkon longer than man.
French: Rankashu est un descendant des anciens Dwarpets. C'est un expert en malédictions, j'imagine qu'il aurait une idée sur la question.

English: He might have some useful information pertaining to this curse and what else I need to do! Will you seek him out for me?
French: Pourriez-vous aller le voir pour moi ?

English: OH! OH! Thank you! I know that Rankashu can't resist Syliaca Fillet and Greemong Jelly. I'm sure if you brought some of these, he'd spill whatever information you wanted!
French: Rankashu aime les filets de Syliaca à la gelée de Greemong, apportez-lui donc 5 de chaque.

English: Hmph! Well, you could be missing out on a chance to not only help me, but possibly learn of the location of the other 2 heroes as well!
French: Par pitié, je n'en peux plus de cette malédiction.

English: Well helloooo there! *sniffs* Is that Syliaca fillets and Greemong Jelly I smell? Oh! Well, of course there WOULD be a request first. Free food, HAH!
French: Huuum ça sent le Syliaca et la gelée de Greemong ! C'est pour moi ?

English: Have you gathered the Syliaca fish and Greemong Jelly? You can find them by killing both Syliaca fish and Greemongs
French: Je vous l'ai dit, il vous faut 5 filets de Syliaca et 5 gelées de Greemong. Apportez le tout à Rankashu.

English: Collect 5 Syliaca Fillet and 5 Greemong Jelly, then bring them to Rankashu in the Western region of Darkon 1.
French: Apportez 5 filets de Syliaca et 5 gelées de Greemong à Rankashu.

English: Catalyst to the Curse
French: Fierté du Héros

English: Ahh so the curse was not released yet? The curse WAS in his body a long time… We need a powerful catalyst to speed up the process. 10 Boo Petals should do the trick!
French: Reodos vous dites ? Oui, je l'ai déjà vu. Il est victime d'une ancienne malédiction. Rien de bien grave pourtant, je me demande pourquoi il n'est pas encore venu m'en parler en personne.

English: Another question? 8 Heroes huh? Well, I did see a strange looking woman enter this dungeon alone several days ago. Not sure if that will help or not!
French: De la fierté mal placée de la part d'un Héros réincarné ? Possible….

English: Anyway! I told you what you need to know. Will you go get the petals now and let me eat in peace?
French: Bref, pour l'aider il me faudrait 10 Pétales de Boo…

English: Yes Yes, acquire 10 Boo Petals from the Boos in the forests of Darkon 3. This should take care of your problem!
French: …pour une tisane…

English: Ahh! Can't you see I'm trying to eat. Please don't disturb me right now!!
French: Vous me prenez pour un charlatan ? C'est vous qui voyez.

English: Aha! I knew Rankashu would spill the information for an easy meal. So these leaves will speed up the process you say?
French: Une tisane pour être débarrassé de la malédiction ? Sérieusement ?

English: I am eating now. I said 10 Boo Petals!
French: Il vous faut vraiment 10 pétales de Boo…

English: Collect 10 Boo Petal, then bring them to Reodos
French: Récoltez 10 pétales de Boo pour Reodos.

English: Carrierbomb Commotion
French: La vraie couleur de la magie

English: Well, here's to hoping! Hmm, Rankashu mentioned something about a strange woman. I wonder who it could be...
French: J'espère que ça sera efficace... pendant que vous étiez parti, j'ai vu une femme entrer seule dans la mine de Dekanes. Je me demande si c'était un Héros.

English: I'm trying to think who this strange woman could be!! In the meantime could you please go kill some Carrierbombs and then return to Rankashu!! I need more time to think!
French: Les Caboom à côté me dérangent. Si vous alliez en tuer quelques-uns et assurer à Rankashu que je prends sa potion ?

English: Thank you thank you thank you!! Go kill 20 Small Carrierbombs & 15 Carrierbombs then return to Rankashu!
French: Merci de votre aide en tout cas.

English: Oh how am I ever supposed to concentrate with these stupid Carrierbombs making a racket!!!
French: Je pensais que vous accepteriez de m'aider.

English: Eh? You're here again? Do you want to know about the woman?
French: Encore vous ? Vous voulez parler de femmes avec moi ?

English: Not yet? Kill the Carrierbombs quickly and go to Rankashu!
French: Déjà de retour ? Je doute que vous ayez déjà tué les Caboom et parlé à Rankashu.

English: Kill 20 Small Carrierbombs & 15 Carrierbombs and return to Rankashu.
French: Tuez 20 Jeunes Caboom et 15 Caboom et parlez à Rankashu.

English: The Dungeon Code
French: La mine de Dekanes

English: Well fine fine! Guess I did finish eating now. Anyway! I saw this particular woman entering the Dekane Dungeon by herself. By the look of her outfit, she may have been a Psykeeper or something.
French: Oh, Reodos a aussi vu cette drôle de femme ? A sa façon de s'habiller, je dirais que c'est une magicienne.

English: Oh! You want to go in after her? Unfortunately, you can't just enter like that. You have to know how exactly!
French: Vous voulez la retrouver dans la mine de Dekanes ? On n'entre pas dans la mine comme ça.

English: If you want to learn how to enter the dungeon, you will need the key code from Cell back at the Erons Factory. He will tell you how to do it!
French: Cell à l'usine des Erons vous aidera à entrer dans la mine.

English: Cell is at the Erons Factory, go ask him how to enter the dungeon.
French: Ne me regardez pas comme ça, je suis un expert en malédictions, pas en mines.

English: Well, there is no other way to get in! Don't look at me! It's not like I know anything!
French: Vous ne pourrez pas entrer dans la mine sans l'aide de Cell.

English: Ah… I remember you from before... Why do you come to see me? Dekanes dungeon? Why would you want to enter that cursed mine?
French: On se connaît, non ?

English: Did you meet Cell at Erons Factory?
French: Vous avez déjà rencontré Cell ?

English: Go to Cell
French: Parlez à Cell pour apprendre comment rentrer dans la mine de Dekanes.

English: Onward Brave Fool!
French: Dans la mine

English: Ahh I see Cell has given you the code to enter the dungeon!
French: Je présume que vous pouvez entrer dans la mine de Dekanes maintenant.

English: Just to be warned, the monsters in the dungeon are quite terrifying! If you feel you aren't prepared for the quest, please go train some more!
French: Attention à vous, les monstres de la mine sont très puissants.

English: Are you going to enter then and look for that woman?
French: J'espère que vous trouverez la femme mystérieuse.

English: Well, you are the bravest fool I've ever met. Let's hope this woman is worth all the effort! Hah!
French: Vous y allez directement ?

English: Changed your mind? Well if you aren't busy, maybe you could go bring me some more Greemong Jelly and Syliaca Fillets! I kid I kid! Haha!
French: Vous avez raison, retournez-vous entrainer un peu avant d'y aller…

English: Woah! Surprised me! Shouldn't sneak up on a lady like that! Hehe.
French: Incroyable ! Vous êtes revenu vivant de la mine !

English: Well, are you going to head into the mine or are you reconsidering already?
French: Entrez dans la mine si vous avez le courage et la force nécessaire.

English: Enter the Dekane Dungeon and search for the Mysterious Woman.
French: Entrez dans la mine de Dekanes et cherchez Ainher.

English: The Alluring Enchantress
French: Maîtresse Ainher

English: Ah! So you braved all the perils of the dungeon just to meet me eh? Oh my name? Well, I don't just give that out to anyone! Hehe.
French: Vous avez bravé les dangers de la mine pour me trouver ? Je sais que je suis belle mais vous n'auriez pas dû !

English: Before I bestow upon you the most graceful name ever, you have to show me you are worthy to receive it! How? Oh its quite simple! Hehe. Just kill 20 Keakoon Guards!
French: Oh, vous ne voulez pas me séduire mais devenir mon disciple ? Voyons de quoi vous êtes capable.

English: There should be more than enough Keakoon Guards in this very dungeon. Just kill 20 of them and you will have the privilege of knowing my name!
French: Commencez par tuer 20 Keakoon.

English: Oh well, I guess that is your loss then. Hehe.
French: Si vous ne faites pas ce que je demande, vous pouvez partir maintenant.

English: Wow, that was quick! Apparently someone really wants to know my name? Hehe.
French: Haan, on dirait que vous voulez vraiment devenir mon disciple !!

English: Well, you could stand there and stare at me all day, but that won't kill those Keakoon Guards any faster now will it? Hehe.
French: Le Maître a dit : allez tuer 20 Keakoon ! Ne revenez pas avant.

English: Kill 20 Keakoon Guards.
French: Tuez 20 Keakoon.

English: Ainher's Request
French: Convaincre la sorcière

English: The name is Ainher. Yes, try not to let the pure beauty of it make you go completely deaf. I'm sure you didn't just come all this way to learn my name though, so what DID you come here for?
French: Quoi, vous ne voulez pas vraiment être mon disciple ? (Vous n'aviez pas réussi à lui faire comprendre avant…) Alors que me voulez-vous ?

English: Hehe, how did you know about the original 8 heroes? Ah it's ok, I've had creepier stalkers! I am the reincarnation of the original Psykeeper Hero Offerep…
French: Ohhh, vous cherchez des Héros réincarnés ! Vous avez la chance, je suis la réincarnation du Héros sorcier Operab.

English: I see. So Reonan looks to reunite the original heroes. If t his is the case, then something important must be going on! Unfortunately, I am rather tied down at the moment with research…
French: Vous parlez de Reonan comme si je devais le connaître. Oh, il est la réincarnation de Billein, le Héros chevalier. Si vous m'aidez à terminer ce que je fais ici, je me joindrai à votre cause.

English: I guess if you maybe helped me to finish my research I would consider joining up. If you want to be of assistance to me, then please go talk to Drico and collect the Agony Ore.
French: Si vous voulez m'aider, demandez du minerai d'agonie à Drico.

English: Agony Ore is quite rare, so I'm sure Drico won't be willing to hand it over right away… But, I guess that is now your problem! Hehe.
French: Le minerai d'agonie est rare et précieux, ça ne sera pas simple de s'en procurer.

English: Change your mind so quickly I see? Guess you weren't in that much of a hurry to get my help then! Hehe.
French: Vous me laissez tomber comme ça ?

English: *Sniff* *Snort* Drico smell a stranger here? What stranger want? *sniff*
French: Que me veux-tu étranger ?

English: Hurry along now! Go find Drico and retrieve the Agony Ore!
French: J'ai dit d'aller demander du minerai d'agonie à Drico.

English: Find Drico in Dekanes dungeon.
French: Trouvez Drico à la mine de Dekanes.

English: Sweet Medication
French: Minerai d'agonie

English: Agony Ore? Khahahahaha! You say want Agony Ore? *snort* *sniff* Agony Ore very rare! I no trade!
French: Vous voulez du minerai d'agonie ? Vous savez ce que vous demandez là ?

English: *sniff*. Hmm...Maybe I change mind If do something for Drico! Tribe need sap of Roach Queen for medicine! *snort* You can collect for Drico?
French: Des gens tuent pour obtenir du minerai d'agonie et vous pensez que je vais vous le donner ? Voilà un marché…

English: Collect sap from Pink Roach Queen and Blue Roach Queen, then bring to Drico.
French: Dans cette mine vivent des Tyroglyphe. Apportez-moi la sève de Tyroglyphe rose et de Tyroglyphe bleus et je vous l'échangerai contre le minerai.

English: You reject such a good chance now? *Sniff* *Sniff*. As you wish~
French: Personne ne vous fera une meilleure offre dans le coin, je vous le garantis.

English: *sniff* *sniff* Drico smell sweet sap!
French: Huuum, vous sentez la sève !

English: Collect Pink Roach Queen Sap and Blue Roach Queen Sap! Sniff!
French: J'ai dit qu'il me fallait de la sève de Tyroglyphe rose et de Tyroglyphe bleu !

English: Pink and Blue Roach Queen deep in dungeon. Please go gather their sap!
French: Rapporter 1 sève de Tyroglyphe rose et 1 sève de Tyroglyphe bleu (obtenues sur les Reines, brisez les œufs pour les attirer).

English: Collective Bargaining
French: Drôle d'odeur...

English: Give Drico Sap! Then Drico hand Ore to stranger! *snort*
